name: Chevening Scholarships (Pakistan)
eligibility_core: Pakistani citizenship
Undergraduate degree
2+ years work experience
Return-to-country requirement
application_window_note: Typically opens Aug and closes in Nov for study the following academic year.
pak_specific_note: Pakistan has a dedicated country page with guidance and FAQs.

name: Commonwealth Scholarships (Master’s & PhD)
eligibility_core: Pakistani citizenship (eligible LMIC)
Academic merit & development impact
Nomination via HEC (Pakistan) for many streams
application_window_note: Master’s applications commonly run Sep–Oct; PhD varies by call.
pak_specific_note: HEC acts as nominating agency; you usually submit on both CSC and HEC portals.

name: Stipendium Hungaricum (Pakistan)
eligibility_core: Pakistani/AJK nationals eligible via HEC nomination
application_window_note: Calls typically open Nov–Jan; check HEC timeline each year.
pak_specific_note: Applications go through BOTH the Hungarian system and HEC portal.

name: Chinese Government Scholarship (CSC)
eligibility_core: Pakistani applicants must apply via HEC as nominating agency for Bilateral Program
application_window_note: HEC/CSC portals usually open Nov–Dec; deadlines vary by year and type.
pak_specific_note: Embassy of China in Pakistan confirms HEC handles nominations; direct embassy submissions not accepted.

name: Türkiye Scholarships (Türkiye Bursları)
administered_by: Presidency for Turks Abroad and Related Communities (YTB)
eligibility_core: Open to Pakistani citizens meeting academic/age criteria
application_window_note: Main call typically Jan–Feb each year.
pak_specific_note: Applications are free and fully online via YTB’s system.

name: DAAD (Germany) – Scholarship Programmes for Pakistan
coverage: Varies by programme; often monthly stipend, travel allowance, insurance, and sometimes tuition contributions
eligibility_core: Pakistani citizens eligible for multiple DAAD schemes (incl. EPOS, research grants)
application_window_note: Programme-specific; many Master’s EPOS deadlines fall Aug–Oct the year before.
pak_specific_note: DAAD’s Pakistan site aggregates open calls and local guidance.

name: Canada Graduate Research Scholarship – Doctoral (CGRS D)
eligibility_core: Open to Canadian and international students at eligible Canadian institutions
Must be enrolled or planning to enrol in a doctoral program at a Canadian institution
application_window_note: Deadlines typically in October for many institutions; check institution quota deadlines.
pak_specific_note: Although open to international students, Pakistani applicants must secure admission at a Canadian eligible institution and review institution-specific quotas for international applicants.

name: Australia Awards (Pakistan)
administered_by: Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade (DFAT)
eligibility_core: Pakistani citizenship; country-specific criteria incl. English proficiency and priority fields
application_window_note: Cycles vary; Pakistan page posts yearly timelines for the next intake.
pak_specific_note: Use the Pakistan country site for current intake status and criteria.

name: Joint Japan/World Bank Graduate Scholarship Program (JJ/WBGSP)
eligibility_core: Citizen of an eligible developing country (Pakistan eligible)
Relevant professional experience
Admission to a participating master’s program
application_window_note: Annual calls—windows differ by participating programs; typically Feb–May.
pak_specific_note: Focus on development-related fields and return-to-country commitment.

name: Erasmus Mundus Joint Masters (EMJM)
eligibility_core: Open to Pakistani citizens; apply to specific EMJM courses via their websites
application_window_note: Most courses accept applications Oct–Jan for the following autumn intake.
pak_specific_note: Pick programs from the official EMJM catalogue; each has its own deadline and criteria.

name: Master Mind Scholarships (Flanders)
eligibility_core: Admission/nomination by a Flemish host university or school of arts
application_window_note: Hosts nominate in spring; check each Flemish university’s internal deadline.
pak_specific_note: Applicants apply through the Flemish institution; no direct government portal submission.

name: Romanian Government Scholarships (MFA)
eligibility_core: Non-EU citizens incl. Pakistan; minimum academic average as defined by call
application_window_note: Recent cycles opened in Jan and closed in March.
pak_specific_note: Applications are exclusively via the Study in Romania platform.

name: France Excellence Eiffel
administered_by: Ministry for Europe and Foreign Affairs (via Campus France, through French institutions)
coverage: Monthly stipend (€1,181 Master’s; higher for PhD)
eligibility_core: Applicants cannot apply directly; French institutions submit nominations
application_window_note: Institution nomination window typically Oct–Jan; internal deadlines vary.
pak_specific_note: Contact target French university early; they set internal cut-offs.

name: Finland Scholarships (university-specific)
administered_by: Finnish universities & UAS (no single central government portal for B/M)
eligibility_core: Non-EU/EEA fee-payers incl. Pakistan
application_window_note: Deadlines follow each university’s admissions round (often Dec–Jan).
pak_specific_note: Search scholarships on your target university’s page; there’s no single state application for Bachelor/Master scholarships.

name: MEXT (Japanese Government) Scholarships – Pakistan
administered_by: Government of Japan (MEXT) via Embassy of Japan in Pakistan
degree_levels: College of Technology/Specialized Training (varies by year)
eligibility_core: Pakistani nationality; age/academic rules by category; embassy-recommended route common
application_window_note: Embassy calls usually open Apr–May with tests/interviews in summer; status varies by year.
pak_specific_note: Apply through Embassy of Japan in Pakistan; timelines posted on embassy site.

name: Global Korea Scholarship (GKS)
eligibility_core: Pakistani citizens can apply via Embassy track or University track when announced
application_window_note: Guidelines typically release Feb–Mar (GKS-G) and Sep (GKS-U), with embassy/university deadlines soon after.
pak_specific_note: Check Embassy of Korea in Islamabad and NIIED notices for Pakistan quotas and deadlines.

name: HEC Pakistan – National & International Scholarship Schemes
coverage: Varies by scheme (tuition, stipend, travel, etc.)
eligibility_core: Pakistani/AJK nationals; scheme-specific academic and domicile criteria
application_window_note: Multiple rolling calls across the year; monitor the HEC scholarship pages.
pak_specific_note: Includes HEC Overseas PhD schemes, need-based, USAID-NBS, and nominating-agency roles for Commonwealth, CSC, SH, etc.
